column4: my computer randomly freezes when I use the default installed firefox on 12.04. Having no issues when using Chromium. Can anyone help me solve this?
any pattern to when it freezes? flash games? webgl?
no pattern. I first though it was related to movies or having multiple windows open but then  a few times ubuntu froze as it opened after booting up.
how hard a freeze is it? do keys like numlock light up? can you REISUB (see !sysrq)?
I never looked for lights but i can't reach any terminals. i.e. CTRL+ALT+F1. Keyboard and mouse  freeze
I definitely try that trick as I hate forceing a shut down. should I try to freeze now to test?
if you are in the mode to try and check sure. you can look at things like /var/log/syslog when you get back and see if there is anything listed
well I definitely prefer firefox so here goes
froze without being able to REISUB. capslock & numlock light could not toggled. checking syslog be toggled
not seeing anything tha scream ERROR WARNING WARNING
if you cant reisub it is unlikely anything will make it to the logs
what kind of filesystem are you using?
default settings on install so etx4?
im running one of the new gtx 680's with ubuntu generic drivers
anything interesting in the first 100 or so lines of dmesg
and what does dmidecode say about your ram?
